title: "Your account is in the process of transferring"
body:
Hello,
I wanted to log in to my other, old account on North America. Each time I logged in through www page said that there is no such account (I tried on every server avaliable).  After logging using client on North America setting I got this error: "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue presists, contact Player Support". I've tried resetting the password but it did not help at all. What can I do to recover my account? Thanks.

replies.body:
Hmmm...it is entirely possible that your smurf account might have been hacked/stolen, which is why you are experiencing that particular error.  The best step you can take right now is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to recover your account.  Make sure to fill out as much information as you remember about it and we may be able to get the account back to you incredibly quickly!

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
Thank you for the help and a quick reply :)
